title: Lost Champions
body: So I bought (and it shows) a champion and a skin, but whenever I open the champion selection menu, he is not available. I looked into what was going on, and it turns out that he is now locked (again) and I had to re-buy him to play him... Here's a picture. If you notice, Ezreal was purchased twice, as well as the skin... I hope this is a fixable error because otherwise I just lost a lot of my money (it was a gift but still...).

replies.body: Thank you very much, it all worked great! :-)

Hello tinylizard!

After reviewing your message, it appears that you experienced an EXTREMELY rare bug regarding the League of Legends store.  To this end, I went ahead and performed an in-depth audit of your account.  From this audit, I was able to confirm that Ezreal was purchased twice due to this bug, and have gone ahead and refunded one of the Ezreal purchases back to you.  I also made sure to refresh the Pulsefire Ezreal skin on your account, and it should be able to be selected in Champion Selection!

I hope this resolves your issues with League of Legends!  :)
